page.title: 12LIFE IN THE DALES (1)
page.content:
'Life in the Yorkshire Dales is quiet and peaceful but there's also a lot of tourists you have to put up wih in the summer. In the day time we go to school apart from the long holiday and at night time we play out or go to youth club which isn't quite as quiet as the Dales.'
(Boy, aged 14)
'The Yorkshire Dales is full of green fields, little becks and tall trees. You can wander through little villages or walk the Three Peaks or on footpaths. I like the Dales because there is space.'
(Boy, aged 14)
